title: Construction for rehabilitation of all the occupants of residential buildings/chawls shall be done by mill owner
clause_text: Construction for rehabilitation of all the occupants of residential buildings/chawls shall be done by mill owner. No incentive FSI against such construction shall be given to landlord/or Co-op. Housing society of occupiers. All the occupant of the old building shall be re-accommodated in the redeveloped building.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Construction for rehabilitation of all the occupants of residential buildings/chawls shall be done by mill owner. No incentive FSI against such construction shall be given to landlord/or Co-op. Housin
